main event: A radar object was observed hovering and then departing at high speed in Hyattsville, Maryland in 1962.
interesting points: The object was tracked on radar for 15 minutes.
The object appeared to be hovering at one point before departing at a high rate of speed.
Three witnesses in Hyattsville, Maryland reported seeing three oval-shaped, glowing objects hovering and moving erratically in the sky for 5-10 minutes in June 1962.
The witnesses stated they were familiar with aircraft and could distinguish the objects from known aerial vehicles.
The Air Force was requested to investigate the sighting, with a contact provided for further information.
sighted object: one radar object, three oval-shaped glowing objects
